t: SmartPlex - App on Amazon Appstore
s: With SmartPlex, an ERP application from the Plex Manufacturing Cloud, you can quickly and securely log into Plex. SmartPlex is a mobile application that gives manufacturers a business advantage, making ERP from the Plex Manufacturing Cloud accessible from a smartphone or tablet.
